metadata.title: Compact Bundle: 2 Pack 300 Piece + 150 Piece First Aid Kits by M2 BASICS
features: SAVE MORE WHEN YOU BUY A BUNDLE!

Kit 1: M2 BASICS 300 Piece (40 Unique Items) First Aid Kit: Best selling and highly reviewed by buyers! Protect family & friends. Always be prepared with the essentials! M2 Basics 300-Piece First Aid Kits will keep you prepared for most common minor injuries or medical emergencies.

Kit 2: 150 PIECE FIRST AID KIT W/ COMPACT BAG: 150 Piece Kit Includes Adhesive Bandages in Many Sizes (Strips, Butterfly, Fingertip, Knuckle, Spot), Prep Wipes, Sterile Wound Cleansing Wipes, Sting Relief Pads, Cotton Tip Applicators, CPR Protective Device, Disposable Nitrile Hand Protection – Latex Free, Metal Scissors Small, Safety Pins, Tourniquet, Medical Tape Roll, Sterile Gauze Sponges (2 Sizes), Carabiner, Emergency Blanket & Carry Case.

VERSATILE KIT TO FIT YOUR LIFESTYLE: Use for home, office, vehicle, workplace, industrial, kitchen, outdoor, tactical, dog, athletic, business, auto, sport, emt, first responder, rv, dog, puppy, pet, baby, daycare, work, boat, marine, military.
description: Save more with an M2 BASICS First Aid Kit bundle that includes the most popular first aid kits available. Prepare for most common emergencies whether at home, work or travel.

Prepare for most common injuries and emergencies! There is never a good place to get hurt but when help is out of reach, a first aid kit is your next best friend.  Being prepared can reduce panic and provide the necessary aid.  When an injury occurs, a stocked first aid kit can save someone’s life. Think about others who are risking injury while on the job and do the right thing. Let everyone know you have a stocked first aid kit ready to use and tell them where it is in case an accident occurs.
